main.title: About me
main.presentation: My name is José Bordón. I hold a degree in Information Systems granted by Universidad Nacional del Nordeste, Argentina. I live in Corrientes, Argentina. At the moment I work as free-lancer web developer. My profile is full-stack, MERN stack mainly (MongoDB + Express + React + NodeJS). This portfolio was made using ReactJS and MaterialUI framework.
main.presentation2: I also have knowledge in PHP frameworks and relational MySQL databases, deployed in Apache servers (LAMP stack). Both stacks have their advantages and disadvantages depending on the project to develop.

projects.title: Projects
projects.sga-title: Sistema de Gestión de Aulas (Classroom Management System)
projects.sga-intro: This project was my final work to obtain my Information Systems degree. This application consists of a full web reservation system, to manage schedules and classrooms of a education institution. The software was implemented in LAMP stack, using Codeigniter as PHP framework over a MySQL relational database.
projects.sga-description-intro: The applications have the following funcionalities:
projects.sga-description-list:
• Login with four different users type
  • Full headquarters, classrooms, laboratories, suers, resources and reservation CRUD
  • Classroom schedule distribution
  • Statics recopilation with comparative graphs and reports
  • Internal inbox
  • E-mails sending
  • Active database, providing backup and resotartion
  • Help section
projects.sga-app-link: You can access to a this application preview in this link. You will be able to see classes schedules of an education institution and filter classrooms and laboratories whitout a registered user.
projects.sga-mono-link: You can also read my monograph of this finarl proyect here.
projects.vanilla-content1: I consider the best way to learn a new programming language is just exploring and having fun. So, when i got started in Javascript world, i developed some little websites to practice DOM manipulation and events, such as classic tic-tac-toe and hangman game.
projects.vanilla-content2: Both games use HTML5 canvas to render the game state. Tic-tac-toe allows playinh with someone else in the same device. Hangman game selects a random word of a JSON file, so you easily can edit this file and put your own words for playing with somebody else.
projects.vanilla-links-intro: Both applications are deployed in my github account, ready to play:
projects.budget-intro: This application help users to keep track of his money incomes and outcomes. The website was developed in MERN stack with MaterialUI.
projects.budget-list-intro: The applications have the following funcionalities:
projects.budget-list:
• Login with JSON Web Token
  • Account dashboard informing total balance of user account
  • Operations register with concept, date and types
  • Full users operations CRUD
  • Help section
projects.ecommerce-intro: This project consists of a full API Rest for a generic online store. The software is developed with NodeJS, ExpressJS y MongoDB. The application have the following funcionalities:
projects.ecommerce-list:
• User register and login verified by JSON Web Token
  • Products tags filter
  • Full products, sales and categories CRUD
projects.ecommerce-current: I'm working on a React application to interact with this API Rest services by the moment.
